seo.title: Power Platform: 1-Hour Briefing
seo.description: Discuss your business challenges with SSW and discover how using Power Platform tools can streamline your processes and drive efficiency

blocks.heading: Power Platform: 2-day Assessment
blocks.body: Receive a 2-day assessment on using Microsoft Power Platform to enhance your business. Our experts will analyze, design solutions, and integrate with Azure to enhance your workflows. Before starting your low-code development, it's important to grasp what Microsoft Power Platform can offer. SSW's Power Platform Assessment gives you a clear analysis and strategic roadmap, helping you make informed decisions on how to use these tools.     Our assessment service, also known as a Specification Review, focuses on understanding your business needs and exploring Power Platform solutions, with Azure integration for improved performance.

accordionItems.label: Business Process Analysis
accordionItems.content: We examine your existing processes and workflows to identify opportunities for automation and optimization using Power Platform.

accordionItems.label: Blueprint Creation
accordionItems.content: We create a comprehensive blueprint for your Power Platform solution, detailing the architecture, required components, and Azure integration points.

accordionItems.label: Licensing and Governance Recommendations
accordionItems.content: We offer guidance on the most cost-effective licensing options and best practices for governing your Power Platform environment.
